allow: Bash(node -e "const { execSync } = require\(''child_process''\); try { execSync\(''node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.build.json'', {stdio: ''pipe''}\); console.log\(''OK''\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(e.stdout?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(e.stderr?.toString\(\)\); }")

Bash(node -e "const { execSync } = require\(''child_process''\); try { execSync\(''npx tsc -p tsconfig.build.json'', {stdio: ''pipe'', cwd: process.cwd\(\)}\); console.log\(''BUILD OK''\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(''STDOUT:'', e.stdout?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(''STDERR:'', e.stderr?.toString\(\)\); }")
